mapper.select: SELECT T.IMPRVM_NO , T.CO_CD , T.IMPRVM_ID , FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(T.IMPRVM_ID) AS IMPRVM_ID_NM , T.IMPRVM_DEPT_CD , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TB_CM04M01 WHERE DEPT_ID = T.IMPRVM_DEPT_CD) AS IMPRVM_DEPT_CD_NM , TO_CHAR(T.IMPRVM_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IMPRVM_DT , T.IMPRVM_TYPE , get_code_names(T.IMPRVM_TYPE) AS IMPRVM_TYPE_NM , T.UNIT_NO , T.SALES_CD , T.PRDT_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_CD_NM , T.PRDT_TYP --콤마로 분리된 문자열입니다. -- , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_TYP) AS PRDT_TYP_NM , T.ITEM_DIV , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.ITEM_DIV) AS ITEM_DIV_NM , T.MC_PART_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.MC_PART_CD) AS MC_PART_CD_NM , T.IMPORTANT_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.IMPORTANT_CD) AS IMPORTANT_CD_NM , T.IMPACT_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.IMPACT_CD) AS IMPACT_CD_NM , T.IMPRVM_TXT , T.IMPRVM_RMK , T.IMPRVM_STS_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.IMPRVM_STS_CD) AS IMPRVM_STS_CD_NM , T.IMPRVM_REQ_TXT , T.IMPRVM_REQ_ID , FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(T.IMPRVM_REQ_ID) AS IMPRVM_REQ_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(T.IMPRVM_REQ_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS IMPRVM_REQ_DTTM , T.EXEC_ACT_DEPT , C.DEPT_NM AS EXEC_ACT_DEPT_NM , T.EXEC_ACT_TXT , T.EXEC_TEAM_TXT , T.EXEC_TEAM_ID , FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(T.EXEC_TEAM_ID) AS EXEC_TEAM_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(T.EXEC_TEAM_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS EXEC_TEAM_DTTM , T.IMPRVM_APPR_GRADE , T.IMPRVM_APPR_POINT , TO_CHAR(T.IMPRVM_APPR_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IMPRVM_APPR_DTTM , T.IMPRVM_APPR_TXT , T.CREAT_ID , FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(T.CREAT_ID) AS CREAT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(T.CREAT_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , T.CREAT_PGM , T.UDT_ID , FN_CM06M01_ID_TO_NM(T.UDT_ID) AS UDT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(T.UDT_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM , T.UDT_PGM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS APP_CNT FROM TB_WB20M03 W WHERE W.TODO_NO = T.IMPRVM_NO AND (W.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV2150' OR W.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV2160') AND W.SANCTN_STTUS = 'Y' ) AS APPROVAL_CNT FROM TB_IM01M01 T LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM04M01 AS C ON C.DEPT_ID = T.EXEC_ACT_DEPT WHERE T.IMPRVM_NO = #{imprvmNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT A.CO_CD AS WBS_PLANCO_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.CO_CD) WBS_PLANCO_CD_NM , A.ID AS USR_NM , A.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO , A.NAME AS NAME , A.TEL_NO AS TEL_NO , A.EMAIL AS EMAIL , B.DEPT_NM AS DT_NM , D.LEVEL_NM AS JIK , C.TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID AS TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID , DECODE(C.TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID, 'TODODIV10', '공유', 'TODODIV20', '결재', '') AS GB , TO_CHAR(C.TODO_CF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODO_CF_DT , TO_CHAR(C.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , C.TODO_CF_OPN , C.SANCTN_STTUS FROM TB_CM06M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM07M01 AS D ON A.LEVEL_CD = D.LEVEL_CD INNER JOIN TB_CM04M01 AS B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN TB_WB20M03 AS C ON A.ID = C.TODO_ID AND C.TODO_FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey} AND C.TODO_NO = #{reqNo} WHERE 1 = 1
AND C.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID IN ('TODODIV1150','TODODIV2150')
AND C.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID IN ('TODODIV1160','TODODIV2160')
ORDER BY C.TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1
